subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Hannes Reichelt led an Austrian sweep at a World Cup super-G yesterday, his second straight victory in the discipline on the Birds of Prey course in Beaver Creek, Colo. Austrians captured five of the top six places, while the best United States skier was Ted Ligety in 23rd place. Bode Miller was 30th.
